channel.title: Posts on Pure theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Pure theme for Hugo

item.title: Myfirst
item.description: 我的第一篇博客 hugo new post/FileName.md hugo server -t pure –buildDrafts //测试静态博客 cd daydream hugo server -t pure –buildDrafts hugo –theme=pure –baseUrl="https://loardforwin.github.io” –buildDrafts cd public git add . git commit -m “这是我的博客” cd.. git remote add origin https://github.com/loardforwin/loardforwin.github.io.git git push
